item.title: Headline goes here
item.description:
A characteristically informative caption in today's Sunday, January 19 2014 Ann Arbor News.
As spotted by Kirk Westphal; too good not to share.

item.title: Dug Song's letter to the Ann Arbor News endorsing Kirk Westphal, annotated
item.description: Dug Song wrote a letter to the editor of the Ann Arbor News which was published on Sunday, 27 October 2013. It is annotated here with the hyperlinks to a variety of sources for further reading. The letter includes a political endorsement. While I deeply appreciate city council's dedication to a balanced budget and basic services, we cannot simply save our way to success. Post-Pfizer, Ann Arbor must increase its tax base by supporting a strong and diversified economy of high-growth, high tech companies.
